actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to establish a system to ration refined petroleum products, natural gas, and natural gas liquids among civilian users in order to provide sufficient fuel for essential agricultural operations, and public health, safety, and essential public services in areas of shortage.

summary.text: Establishes a system to ration refined petroleum products, natural gas, and natural gas liquids among civilian users in order to provide sufficient fuel for essential agricultural operations, and public health, safety, and essential public services in areas of shortage.

titles.title: A bill to establish a system to ration refined petroleum products, natural gas, and natural gas liquids among civilian users in order to provide sufficient fuel for essential agricultural operations, and public health, safety, and essential public services in areas of shortage.
